Text: Day 1, 08:45

With a cold and ruthless laugh, you pull the trigger, ending the raider's life. Their body falls limp, lifeless, as the sound of the gunshot reverberates through the air. While it may have been a justified act in a post-apocalyptic world, it is a stark reminder of the harsh choices one must make to survive.

Your action reflects a ruthless and unforgiving nature. As a result, your score has been decreased by 10 points, bringing your total score to -10.

With the immediate threat neutralized, what is your next course of action?
